column3: Latest;Sihanoukville: A Chinese man who was dissed by a fellow Chinese man took a knife
column4: and stabbed his countryman.------The victim was seriously injured and died in the provincial hospital on Dec. 2

column2: WA Rong was also an employee at the same restaurant
column4: in Village 4.------Police have also taken the murder weapon
column6: as evidence to prepare a court case.------Cambodia Police
